pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Noto Color Emoji 1.3x is the chubby Jelly Bean emoji set and Emoji 4.0 ready font supporting colored skin tones.
Noto Color Emoji 2.x is the rounder Oreo style with the latest Emoji 12.0 set.
Noto Color Emoji 2.019_beta20200307_p20200721 adds up to Unicode 13 emojis.
Noto Color Emoji 2.020 adds Unicode 13.1 support and new emojis.
